Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students attempting to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate a device that uses sound for communication, such as a string telephone.
The student can show how the string telephone sends and receives sound information across a distance.
The student can depict the use of materials provided to create the string telephone, like two cups and a string.
The student can include specific features that make the device work, such as the tension in the string.
The student can demonstrate an understanding that the string telephone relates to real-world technology used for long-distance communication.
